definition: four times as great or many, a quantity that is four times as great as another, increase fourfold
details:
adjective
- four times as great or many
= synonyms: fourfold
- having four units or components
= example: having four units or components
= synonyms: fourfold
noun
- a quantity that is four times as great as another
- a set of four similar things considered as a unit
= synonyms: quartet, quartette, quadruplet
verb
- increase fourfold
= example: increase fourfold
